Interface DocumentManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    iServeComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentManagerFileSystem

    public interface DocumentManager
extends iServeComponent
    Class Description TODO: Distinguish between the metadata and the actual document and provide methods for accessing both
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clearDocuments()
      Deletes all the documents in iServe After successfully clearing the documents, implementations of this method should raise a DocumentsClearedEvent
